name: Short Passing
description: Ability to make accurate short passes.

name: Reflexes
description: Quick reactions to sudden situations.

name: Anticipation
description: Reading the game to predict opponents' moves.

name: Aerial Ability
description: Skill in contests for the ball in the air.

name: Positioning
description: Ability to be in the right place at the right time.

name: Tackling
description: Ability to win the ball through defensive challenges.

name: Marking
description: Ability to closely defend an opponent.

name: Ball Recovery
description: Skill in regaining possession for the team.

name: Finishing
description: Ability to score goals effectively.

name: Heading
description: Skill in using the head to pass or score.

name: Strength
description: Physical power to hold off opponents.

name: Stamina/Body Balance
description: Balance and robustness in physical duels.

name: Speed
description: Ability to move quickly with or without the ball.

name: Agility
description: Quick and fluid body movement.

name: Creativity
description: Imagination to create chances and unlock defenses.

name: Passing
description: General ability to distribute the ball.

name: Endurance
description: Ability to maintain performance over time.

name: Free Kicks
description: Skill in shooting directly from free kicks.

name: Dribbling
description: Ability to beat opponents with ball control.

name: Technique
description: Overall technical control of the ball.

name: Leadership
description: Ability to inspire and guide teammates.

name: Aggressiveness
description: Determination and intensity in challenges.

name: Intelligence
description: Tactical awareness and smart decision-making.

name: Ball Control
description: Ability to control and receive the ball cleanly.

name: Mobility
description: Ability to move into useful spaces effectively.
